thread.section_title: Flatmates.com.au Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flatmates.com.au | flatmates.com.au
thread.title: Jini William

author: Jini William
title: Jini William
text:
Initially I thought its going to be very difficult to find a right flatmate,as iam on long holidays in overseas. ..But this wonderful site helped me to find a right flatmate without any strain...After selecting a right person,the owner needs to check the identity proof,reference letter,salary slips etc ...
When I requested these documents to few people,they were dodgy....may be there are some bad people out there to cheat vulnerable lady owners or elderly landlords ...please be aware....On the whole,my experience in surfing this site has been a pleasant one n I would recommend to others.... Best wishes to Flatmates.com,being part of our local business....Thank you...
